text: Goofball is the second extended play by English music producer and sound designer Eddie Jefferys, known as his stage name Moody Good. It was released by English record label Never Say Die on 15 March 2019. It has four songs, including a collaboration with Australian electronic music producer Hydraulix. ==Track listing== ==Release history== Region Date Format Label Worldwide 15 March 2019 Digital download Never Say Die ==References== Category:2019 albums
title: Goofball (EP)
